project_descr: MNE Local Contribution to the RELOAD

outputs.output_descr: The Action will focus on institutionalizing the interaction between local governments and CSOs, while strengthening capacities of all relevant stakeholders to engage more productively in such partnerships. Importantly, the underlying intention of the Action is to replicate and sustain a transparent, development-oriented and project-based approach to funding of CSOs by municipal budgets that contributes to realization of legitimate local priorities in line with local development strategies. Moreover, mechanisms for monitoring of projects activities and results implemented by CSOs will be create

project_title: mne local contribution to the reload
